records.location_text_raw: in his tent, in the camp
records.uncertainty_note: Specific camp name is redacted, country inferred from context (Athens, Poseidon Sea operation).
records.context_note: False information about the death was spread in the camp by NGO workers, causing concerns among migrants.
records.evidence_quote: a 22 years old male Egyptian migrant was found unconscious by another migrant in his tent. An immediate called doctor in [redacted] could only diagnose his death.
